metadata.title: CVE-2018-15869 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An Amazon Web Services (AWS) developer who does not specify the --ownersflag when describing images via AWS CLI, and therefore not properlyvalidating source software per AWS recommended security best practices, mayunintentionally load an undesired and potentially malicious Amazon MachineImage (AMI) from the uncurated public community AMI catalog.

criterions.comment: packer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
